name: QS Discover for Masters and MBA in Ottawa
content: Register at this link: https://bit.ly/3wZaCIZ Learn more about graduate school admissions, financing options, and attend career and personal branding panels. Get a step ahead of your competition and meet admissions representatives face-to-face. You'll also become eligible for exclusive scholarships and a free professional headshot taken onsite, just for attending! The event is free, but spots are limited, so make sure to register now. Save your place by registering today: https://bit.ly/3wZaCIZ Time: 5:00 PM - 8:30 PM Venue details: Shaw Centre, 55 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1N 9J2, Canada Price: Free: CAD 0.00
